author: none@none.com (Reuters)
title: Gold set for best year in three on hopes for Fed rate cuts
text:
Gold prices were set on Friday for their best year in three, as expectations grew for US interest rate cuts early next year and the war in Ukraine and tensions in the Middle East lifted safe-haven demand.
Spot gold was up 0.2% at $2,069.80 per ounce, as of 0350 GMT. It has risen 14% so far this year, heading for its biggest annual gain since 2020. US gold futures fell 0.2% to $2,079.10 per ounce.
“Gold prices seem to end the year near current levels, while the main driver next year would be the timing and depth of Fed interest rate cuts,” said Ilya Spivak, head of global macro at Tastylive.
Bets for rate cuts from the US Federal Reserve have firmed in the wake of cooler inflation data, with traders now pricing in an 88% chance of monetary policy easing in March, according to the CME FedWatch tool. Lower interest rates decrease the opportunity cost of holding non-yielding bullion.
The dollar index edged lower on Friday and was poised for its worst yearly performance in three years, boosting gold’s appeal for other currency holders.
Yields on 10-year Treasury notes languished near their lowest level since July at 3.8424%. Going forward, “refinancing risk is a potent threat to financial stability.
If that shakes credit markets and forces the Fed to ramp up stimulus in a hurry, gold will accelerate higher,“ Spivak said.
Spot silver fell 0.5% to $23.81 per ounce, but looked set to the end the year largely flat.
Platinum rose 0.2% to $1,002.50 per ounce, while palladium was steady at $1,132.90. Both autocatalytic metals were on track for a yearly decline, with palladium down 37% - its biggest since 2008.
Gold set for best year in three on hopes for Fed rate cuts

Cummins takes two as Pakistan chase Australia Test win

author: Fernando de Lama
title: La DANA roza Ibiza y la Aemet sube la alerta a naranja
text: Temporal La DANA roza Ibiza y la Aemet sube la alerta a naranja Fuertes lluvias en algunos puntos de la isla desde primera hora de la mañana La Aermet prevé precipitaciones acumuladas de hasta 50 litros en una hora Fernando de Lama La [DANA que ha golpeado en los últimos días todo el litoral mediterráneo](/sociedad/2024/10/29/alerta-dana-temporal-levante-valencia-alicante-murcia-malaga-castellon-110801059.html) español sigue activa y en las últimas horas se ha situado en el mar al norte de la isla. Aemet ha elevado la alerta amarilla a naranja porque se prevén episodios de alrededor de 50 litros por metro cuadrado en una hora. El riesgo naranja permanecerá activo hasta las 20 horas de este viernes día festivo de Tots Sants. Las lluvias han descargado con fuerza en algunos puntos de la isla desde primera hora de la mañana, ya que la tormenta ha barrido buena parte de la isla. Sobre todo en la zona norte, con chubascos potentes en la zona de Sant Vicent, Sant Joan y entre Santa Agnès y Sant Mateu. Pero también se han producido lluvias intensas en otros puntos, como el Pla de Sant Antoni, en Santa Eulària hacia el interior e incluso en puntos aislados de Sant Josep y en la ciudad de Eivissa, donde se han producido algunas inundaciones. También en las últimas horas se han producido tormentas en Formentera. No circular por las carreteras Se recomienda no estar en zonas inundables ni utilizar las carreteras, ya que es un fenómeno impredecible que puede descargar tormentas y provocar inundaciones en pocos minutos. Desde las 9 de la mañana también han descargado decenas de rayos en diferentes puntos de la isla. Aunque el grueso de la [DANA](/tags/dana/) sigue afectando desde anoche principalmente a la zona de Castellón y el Sur de Tarragona, se ha ido desplazando hacia el Mediterráneo y un frente está situado durante toda la madrugada y la mañana entre Ibiza y Mallorca. El Govern pide "máxima prudencia" Ante la emergencia meteorológica para este día de Tots Sants, el Govern balear ha reclamado “máxima prudencia” a los ciudadanos “las próximas horas y días” por la alerta naranja decretada. Se recomienda que se tomen precauciones y mantenerse informado de la predicción meteorológica más actualizada. Las actividades habituales y al aire libre pueden verse alteradas. El Servicio de Emergencias 112 ha activado el Índice de Gravedad 1 (IG1) del Plan Meteobal por lluvias y tormentas en Ibiza, Formentera, Mallorca y Menorca. Recomendaciones para la alerta naranja - Planificar las visitas a los cementerios en función de las condiciones meteorológicas y extremar las precauciones, prestando especial atención a las personas más vulnerables. - En el hogar, asegurar puertas y ventanas y quedarse en las zonas altas de la casa. Se aconseja también retirar del exterior todo lo que pueda ser arrastrado por el agua y trasladar medicamentos, documentos y elementos de valor, así como comida y agua potable a los lugares altos de la casa. - Se recomienda evitar los sótanos o zonas bajas, como garajes, y desconectar el interruptor general de electricidad en el caso de que el agua ya haya entrado en la casa. - En el exterior, aconsejan alejarse de torrentes y zonas inundables y, en zona urbana, buscar refugio en un edificio. No se aconseja caminar por zonas con agua en movimiento, ya que, cuanto más rápido corre el agua, más peligro hay. - Hay que evitar los desplazamientos en coche y, si es necesario circular, se debe moderar la velocidad y aumentar la distancia de seguridad. Se tiene que hacer por autopistas, autovías y carreteras principales. En caso de baja visibilidad, se debe detener el vehículo y señalizar su posición. - No se debe entrar en zonas inundables, aunque parezca que hay poca agua, ya que, con poca altura de agua, los coches flotan y son arrastrados fácilmente. Si el coche comienza a flotar y es arrastrado, hay que salir del vehículo de forma inmediata y, si no se puede por la puerta, se debe hacer por la ventana. En estos casos es recomendable abandonar el vehículo y dirigirse a zonas más altas en caso de que el coche quede inmovilizado por el agua o que el nivel de agua ya llegue al eje. - Aconsejan también llevar el móvil cargado y suficiente combustible en el vehículo y no aparcar en puentes, aceras o desembocaduras. En caso de emergencia, hay que llamar al 112. author: Redacción PERÚ21
title: ¡Emotivo! En misa por la muerte de Pedro Suárez-Vértiz cantaron ‘Me elevé’
text: Un momento inolvidable. La misa de cuerpo presente de [Pedro Suárez-Vértiz](https://peru21.pe/noticias/pedro-suarez-vertiz/) fue muy emotiva, pero sin duda a más de uno se le escarapeló la piel cuando comenzaron a entonar ‘Me elevé’, una de las canciones más populares del rockero. MIRA: [Jaime Bayly revela que Pedro Suárez-Vértiz le escribió una canción y lloró al escucharla] La misa llegaba a su fin, la viuda Cynthia Martínez dio una breves, pero emocionantes palabras en memoria de Pedro, y luego Patricio Suárez-Vértiz y Nina Mutal comenzaron a cantar el hit noventero, acompañados por la guitarra de Edward Málaga. Entonces, todos los amigos, familiares y fans comenzaron a corear la canción, una de las más valoradas de la discografía del cantante. “Me elevé, hasta el fin. Vi una luz y escuché una voz en silencio”, entonaron los presentes. Luego, cuando el cuerpo de Pedro estaba saliendo de la iglesia Nuestra Señora de Fátima de Miraflores, nuevamente los cantantes comenzaron a entonar un nuevo tema, esta vez fue ‘No pensé que era amor’, el cual también fue coreado por todos los presentes. El popular cantante y exlíder de Arena Hash perdió la vida la mañana del jueves a causa de un paro cardiaco. Su deceso se produjo en el cuarto piso de un edificio en Miraflores. Perú21 ePaper, [ingresa aquí ](https://epaper.peru21.pe/)y pruébalo gratis.

author: Shaquille Davis
title: Catholic Charities is opening a temporarily warming center - News8000.com - WKBT
text: LA CROSSE (WKBT) -- As the temperature starts to go below zero, the city of La Crosse is opening an emergency day shelter to keep the less fortunate warm. The shelter will only be open from Jan. 14 - 15 for a set time. LA CROSSE (WKBT) -- As the temperature starts to go below zero, the city of La Crosse is opening an emergency day shelter to keep the less fortunate warm. The shelter will only be open from Jan. 14 - 15 for a set time. For both days it will be open from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. and is located at 621 3rd Street North. Another shelter will be opening its doors and providing transportation from the La Crosse emergency shelter. The Catholic Charities will be opening its warming center to anyone who needs shelter during these frigid conditions. "What we're doing is basically folks that need a place to go during the day they can go to that shelter," explains Director of the Catholic Charities Warming Center Rob Grover. "And then in the even hours, our shelter open up about 6:30 p.m. people can start coming and then you can spend the night there all the way til 8 a.m. the next day" Grover also says they are looking for volunteers and donations to help keep the shelter up and running. If you'd like to donate or volunteer, [here](https://cclse.org/) is the link to their website. COPYRIGHT 2024 BY NEWS 8 NOW/NEWS 8000. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. author: ABP News Bureau
title: Ayodhya Ram Mandir Opening Consecration Inauguration Narendra Modi Online Pass Booking Documents Details Srjbtkshetra.org
text:
Ram Mandir Inauguration: For devotees planning to attend the Aarti of Lord Ram at the Ram Mandir in Ayodhya, the Ram Mandir Trust has introduced an online application process for passes, allowing individuals to secure their spots without the need to stand in queues at the temple's physical counter. As the inauguration of the Ram Mandir draws near — set for January 22, 2024 — the surge in crowds, particularly at the pass counter, has prompted the Trust to provide an online alternative for devotees. This latest initiative enables individuals to apply for passes from the comfort of their homes.
Ram Mandir Opening: Online Pass Details Prakash Gupta, a member of the Ram Mandir Trust, shared with news agency PTI, "The trust has decided to make 20 passes available online out of the total passes being issued. This facility became operational yesterday. Now, individuals desiring to attend the Aarti can proactively obtain their passes for future dates. Twenty passes for each of the three Aartis have been made available online. Anyone can visit the website and secure a pass for a later date."
The Trust's decision to implement an online pass application system has been warmly welcomed by devotees. One devotee expressed, "This is a commendable initiative. The public will benefit from the convenience of obtaining passes from the comfort of their homes, saving them valuable time."
Another devotee added, "Online Aarti pass applications not only save time but also allow individuals to plan their schedules once all arrangements are in place."
Ram Mandir Opening: How To Book Passes Online, Aarti Timings For those interested in booking passes online, the official website of Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Teerth Kshetra, accessible at https://srjbtkshetra.org/ , provides the platform for securing passes.
The temple offers darshan timings from 7am to 11:30am and from 2pm to 7pm.
The temple conducts Aarti thrice a day, with Morning Jagran or Shringar Aarti at 6:30am, afternoon Bhog Aarti at 12:30pm, and evening Aarti at 07:30pm.
For Aarti passes, you will need to have four documents handy — Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Driving Licence, and Passport. It is expected that having one of these should be enough for any verification/security procedures.
Advance booking is available for the morning Aarti, subject to pass availability while booking for the Sandhya Aarti during the day is also contingent upon availability. Devotees can plan their visits accordingly through the online pass application system.

author: MarketScreener
title: US states sue over Biden rule extending health insurance to DACA immigrants - MarketScreener
text:
(Reuters) - A group of Republican-led states filed a lawsuit on Thursday seeking to block the Biden administration from allowing up to 200,000 immigrants brought to the U.S. illegally as children to access federally-run health insurance.
The 15 states led by the office of Republican Kansas Attorney General Kris Kobach say a rule adopted by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services in May violates a federal law that prohibits giving public benefits to people who lack legal immigration status.
The rule classifies participants in the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program created in 2012 as "legally present" in the United States, allowing them to enroll in basic healthcare programs created by the 2010 Affordable Care Act, known as Obamacare.
But Kansas and the other states in their lawsuit said that because individuals have to lack legal status to enroll in DACA, they are by definition not legally present in the country.
They said the rule improperly encourages DACA recipients to remain in the United States illegally, in turn forcing states to spend millions of dollars on public services for them and their children.
The White House and the Department of Health and Human Services did not immediately respond to requests for comment.
Separately on Thursday, Texas Governor Greg Abbott, a Republican, issued an executive order directing state officials to begin tracking the costs to the state of providing medical care to people in the country illegally.
The DACA program offers deportation relief and work permits to "Dreamer" immigrants who were illegally brought to the U.S. overstayed a visa as children. About 530,000 people are currently enrolled in the program, which remains subject to an ongoing legal fight.
Under the HHS rule, which takes effect Nov. 1, DACA enrollees will have access to insurance and related financial assistance such as tax credits and reduced out-of-pocket costs under the change.
Immigration has emerged as a top issue for voters ahead of the Nov. 5 presidential election pitting Vice President Kamala Harris, a Democrat, against Republican former President Donald Trump.
Trump, an immigration hardliner, tried to end DACA during his presidency but was denied by the U.S. Supreme Court. The Trump campaign in May blasted the healthcare rule, calling it "unfair and unsustainable."
(Reporting by Daniel Wiessner in Albany, New York; editing by Diane Craft)
By Daniel Wiessner
Share © Reuters - 2024

author: globo.com
title: Rio tem dez cidades em estado de emergência por risco de chuvas intensas e inundações; veja quais
text:
Angra dos Reis - inundações Belford Roxo - chuvas intensas Duque de Caxias - chuvas intensas Japeri - chuvas intensas Mesquita - chuvas intensas Nilópolis - chuvas intensas Nova Iguaçu - chuvas intensas Queimados - chuvas intensas Rio de Janeiro - chuvas intensas São João do Meriti - chuvas intensas Nesta quinta-feira, a Defesa Civil Nacional alertou sobre os cuidados e medidas que a população deve adotar:
Em áreas de risco, como encostas, é preciso ficar muito atento a qualquer sinal de movimentação do terreno, como trincas e rachaduras em postes e paredes; Cadastrar os telefones celulares, enviando mensagens de texto para o número 40199 com o CEP da região onde mora, para passar a receber alertas por SMS. Fique atento às informações da Defesa Civil, principalmente dos municípios, que dão a primeira resposta aos desastres Desligue aparelhos elétricos e quadro geral de energia Em caso de enxurrada ou similar, coloque documentos e objetos de valor em sacos plásticos Em caso de situação de grande perigo confirmada: Procure abrigo, evite permanecer ao ar livre
Ainda segudo a Defesa Civil Nacional, as localidades que mais preocupam são o estado de São Paulo, na região metropolitana, no Vale do Paraíba e no litoral norte. No sábado, o estado do Rio de Janeiro, o Sul e a Zona da Mata de Minas Gerais.
Mais recente Próxima Paes atualiza situação das chuvas no Rio e mantém cidade em estágio de mobilização Inscreva-se na Newsletter: Notícias do Rio
